verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> the words הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <WH7892> of this song הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> in בְּיוֹם֩ <WH3117> in the day הִצִּ֨יל <WH5337> had delivered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> him out of the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֹיְבָ֖יו <WH341> of all his enemies וּמִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> and out of the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> of Saul
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And he said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD סַֽלְעִ֥י <WH5553> [is] my rock וּמְצֻדָתִ֖י <WH4686> and my fortress וּמְפַלְטִי־ <WH6403> and my deliverer לִֽי׃

אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> The God צוּרִ֖י <WH6697> of my rock אֶחֱסֶה־ <WH2620> in him will I trust בּ֑וֹ מָגִנִּ֞י <WH4043> [he is] my shield וְקֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> and the horn יִשְׁעִ֗י <WH3468> of my salvation מִשְׂגַּבִּי֙ <WH4869> my high tower וּמְנוּסִ֔י <WH4498> and my refuge מֹשִׁעִ֕י <WH3467> my saviour מֵחָמָ֖ס <WH2555> me from violence תֹּשִׁעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> thou savest
מְהֻלָּ֖ל <WH1984> [who is] worthy to be praised אֶקְרָ֣א <WH7121> I will call יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> on the LORD וּמֵאֹיְבַ֖י <WH341> from mine enemies אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> so shall I be saved

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֲפָפֻ֖נִי <WH661> compassed מִשְׁבְּרֵי־ <WH4867> When the waves מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> of death נַחֲלֵ֥י <WH5158> me the floods בְלִיַּ֖עַל <WH1100> of ungodly men יְבַעֲתֻֽנִי׃ <WH1204> made me afraid
חֶבְלֵ֥י <WH2256> The sorrows שְׁא֖וֹל <WH7585> of hell סַבֻּ֑נִי <WH5437> compassed me about קִדְּמֻ֖נִי <WH6923> prevented מֹֽקְשֵׁי־ <WH4170> the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> In my distress לִי֙ אֶקְרָ֣א <WH7121> I called יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> upon the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> to my God אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> and cried וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> and he did hear מֵהֵֽיכָלוֹ֙ <WH1964> out of his temple קוֹלִ֔י <WH6963> my voice וְשַׁוְעָתִ֖י <WH7775> and my cry בְּאָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> [did enter] into his ears

[וַתְגָּעַשׁ כ] (וַיִּתְגָּעַ֤שׁ <WH1607> shook ק) וַתִּרְעַשׁ֙ <WH7493> and trembled הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> Then the earth מוֹסְד֥וֹת <WH4146> the foundations הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <WH7264> moved וַיִּֽתְגָּעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH1607> and shook כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because חָ֥רָה <WH2734> because he was wroth לֽוֹ׃

עָלָ֤ה <WH5927> There went up עָשָׁן֙ <WH6227> a smoke בְּאַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> out of his nostrils וְאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> and fire מִפִּ֖יו <WH6310> out of his mouth תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> devoured גֶּחָלִ֖ים <WH1513> coals בָּעֲר֥וּ <WH1197> were kindled מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at
וַיֵּ֥ט <WH5186> He bowed שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> the heavens וַיֵּרַ֑ד <WH3381> also and came down וַעֲרָפֶ֖ל <WH6205> and darkness תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> [was] under his feet

וַיִּרְכַּ֥ב <WH7392> And he rode עַל־ <WH5921> on כְּר֖וּב <WH3742> upon a cherub וַיָּעֹ֑ף <WH5774> and did fly וַיֵּרָ֖א <WH7200> and he was seen עַל־ <WH5921> on כַּנְפֵי־ <WH3671> upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of the wind

וַיָּ֥שֶׁת <WH7896> And he made חֹ֛שֶׁךְ <WH2822> darkness סְבִיבֹתָ֖יו <WH5439> round about סֻכּ֑וֹת <WH5521> pavilions חַֽשְׁרַת־ <WH2841> him dark מַ֖יִם <WH4325> waters עָבֵ֥י <WH5645> [and] thick clouds שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> of the skies
מִנֹּ֖גַהּ <WH5051> Through the brightness נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <WH5048> before בָּעֲר֖וּ <WH1197> kindled גַּחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> before him were coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of fire
יַרְעֵ֥ם <WH7481> thundered מִן־ <WH4480> from שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> from heaven יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְעֶלְי֖וֹן <WH5945> and the most High יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> uttered קוֹלֽוֹ׃ <WH6963> his voice
וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> And he sent out חִצִּ֖ים <WH2671> arrows וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם <WH6327> and scattered בָּרָ֖ק <WH1300> them lightning [וַיְּהֻמֵּם כ] (וַיָּהֹֽם׃ <WH2000> break ק)

וַיֵּֽרָאוּ֙ <WH7200> appeared אֲפִ֣קֵי <WH650> And the channels יָ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea יִגָּל֖וּ <WH1540> were discovered מֹסְד֣וֹת <WH4146> the foundations תֵּבֵ֑ל <WH8398> of the world בְּגַעֲרַ֣ת <WH1606> at the rebuking יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִנִּשְׁמַ֖ת <WH5397> at the blast ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> of the breath אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> of his nostrils
יִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> He sent מִמָּר֖וֹם <WH4791> from above יִקָּחֵ֑נִי <WH3947> he took יַֽמְשֵׁ֖נִי <WH4871> me he drew מִמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> me out of many

יַצִּילֵ֕נִי <WH5337> He delivered מֵאֹיְבִ֖י <WH341> enemy עָ֑ז <WH5794> me from my strong מִשֹּׂ֣נְאַ֔י <WH8130> [and] from them that hated כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָמְצ֖וּ <WH553> me for they were too strong מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> were too
יְקַדְּמֻ֖נִי <WH6923> They prevented בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> me in the day אֵידִ֑י <WH343> of my calamity וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> but the LORD מִשְׁעָ֖ן <WH4937> was my stay לִֽי׃

וַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> He brought me forth לַמֶּרְחָ֖ב <WH4800> also into a large place אֹתִ֑י <WH853> יְחַלְּצֵ֖נִי <WH2502> he delivered כִּי־ <WH3588> because חָ֥פֵֽץ <WH2654> me because he delighted בִּֽי׃

יִגְמְלֵ֥נִי <WH1580> rewarded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD כְּצִדְקָתִ֑י <WH6666> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹ֥ר <WH1252> according to the cleanness יָדַ֖י <WH3027> of my hands יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> hath he recompensed לִֽי׃

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֖רְתִּי <WH8104> For I have kept דַּרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not רָשַׁ֖עְתִּי <WH7561> and have not wickedly departed מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> from my God

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all [מִשְׁפֹּטֹו כ] (מִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> adversary ק) לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> before וְחֻקֹּתָ֖יו <WH2708> [were] before me and [as for] his statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> did not אָס֥וּר <WH5493> I did not depart מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at
וָאֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> was also תָמִ֖ים <WH8549> I was also upright ל֑וֹ וָאֶשְׁתַּמְּרָ֖ה <WH8104> before him and have kept מֵעֲוֹנִֽי׃ <WH5771> myself from mine iniquity

וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <WH7725> hath recompensed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD לִ֖י כְּצִדְקָתִ֑י <WH6666> me according to my righteousness כְּבֹרִ֖י <WH1252> according to my cleanness לְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> before עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> his eyes

עִם־ <WH5973> With חָסִ֖יד <WH2623> With the merciful תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד <WH2616> thou wilt shew thyself merciful עִם־ <WH5973> with גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> man תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> [and] with the upright תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ <WH8552> thou wilt shew thyself upright

עִם־ <WH5973> With נָבָ֖ר <WH1305> With the pure תִּתָּבָ֑ר <WH1305> thou wilt shew thyself pure וְעִם־ <WH5973> and with עִקֵּ֖שׁ <WH6141> and with the froward תִּתַּפָּֽל׃ <WH6617> thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury

וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַ֥ם <WH5971> people עָנִ֖י <WH6041> And the afflicted תּוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> thou wilt save וְעֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> but thine eyes עַל־ <WH5921> are on רָמִ֥ים <WH7311> [are] upon the haughty תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <WH8213> [that] thou mayest bring [them] down

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You נֵירִ֖י <WH5216> For thou [art] my lamp יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD יַגִּ֥יהַּ <WH5050> will lighten חָשְׁכִּֽי׃ <WH2822> my darkness
כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בְכָ֖ה אָר֣וּץ <WH7323> For by thee I have run גְּד֑וּד <WH1416> through a troop בֵּאלֹהַ֖י <WH430> by my God אֲדַלֶּג־ <WH1801> have I leaped over שֽׁוּר׃ <WH7791> a wall

הָאֵ֖ל <WH410> [As for] God תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> [is] perfect דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way אִמְרַ֤ת <WH565> the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD צְרוּפָ֔ה <WH6884> [is] tried מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> he [is] a buckler ה֔וּא <WH1931> he לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all הַחֹסִ֥ים <WH2620> to all them that trust בּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֥י <WH3588> For מִי־ <WH4310> who אֵ֖ל <WH410> For who [is] God מִבַּלְעֲדֵ֣י <WH1107> save יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Jehovah וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who צ֖וּר <WH6697> rock מִֽבַּלְעֲדֵ֥י <WH1107> save אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> angels
הָאֵ֥ל <WH410> God מָעוּזִּ֖י <WH4581> [is] my strength חָ֑יִל <WH2428> [and] power וַיַּתֵּ֥ר <WH5425> and he maketh תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> perfect [דַּרְכֹּו כ] (דַּרְכִּֽי׃ <WH1870> along ק)

מְשַׁוֶּ֥ה <WH7737> like [רַגְלָיו כ] (רַגְלַ֖י <WH7272> be able to endure ק) כָּאַיָּל֑וֹת <WH355> hinds' וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> on בָּמוֹתַ֖י <WH1116> me upon my high places יַעֲמִדֵֽנִי׃ <WH5975> [feet] and setteth

מְלַמֵּ֥ד <WH3925> He teacheth יָדַ֖י <WH3027> my hands לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to war וְנִחַ֥ת <WH5181> is broken קֶֽשֶׁת־ <WH7198> so that a bow נְחוּשָׁ֖ה <WH5154> of steel זְרֹעֹתָֽי׃ <WH2220> by mine arms
וַתִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> Thou hast also given לִ֖י מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> me the shield יִשְׁעֶ֑ךָ <WH3468> of thy salvation וַעֲנֹתְךָ֖ <WH6031> defile תַּרְבֵּֽנִי׃ <WH7235> hath made me great
תַּרְחִ֥יב <WH7337> Thou hast enlarged צַעֲדִ֖י <WH6806> my steps תַּחְתֵּ֑נִי <WH8478> under וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not מָעֲד֖וּ <WH4571> did not slip קַרְסֻלָּֽי׃ <WH7166> under me so that my feet

אֶרְדְּפָ֥ה <WH7291> I have pursued אֹיְבַ֖י <WH341> mine enemies וָאַשְׁמִידֵ֑ם <WH8045> and destroyed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not אָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> them and turned not again עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3615> until I had consumed

וָאֲכַלֵּ֥ם <WH398> burn up וָאֶמְחָצֵ֖ם <WH4272> them and wounded וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יְקוּמ֑וּן <WH6965> them that they could not arise וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> yea they are fallen תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> under my feet

וַתַּזְרֵ֥נִי <WH247> For thou hast girded חַ֖יִל <WH2428> me with strength לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to battle תַּכְרִ֥יעַ <WH3766> against me hast thou subdued קָמַ֖י <WH6965> them that rose up תַּחְתֵּֽנִי׃ <WH8478> under
וְאֹ֣יְבַ֔י <WH341> of mine enemies תַּ֥תָּה <WH5414> Thou hast also given לִּ֖י עֹ֑רֶף <WH6203> me the necks מְשַׂנְאַ֖י <WH8130> them that hate וָאַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <WH6789> that I might destroy

יִשְׁע֖וּ <WH8159> They looked וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there מֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> but [there was] none to save אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [even] unto the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not עָנָֽם׃ <WH6030> but he answered

וְאֶשְׁחָקֵ֖ם <WH7833> Then did I beat כַּעֲפַר־ <WH6083> them as small as the dust אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כְּטִיט־ <WH2916> them as the mire חוּצ֥וֹת <WH2351> of the street אֲדִקֵּ֖ם <WH1854> I did stamp אֶרְקָעֵֽם׃ <WH7554> [and] did spread them abroad

וַֽתְּפַלְּטֵ֔נִי <WH6403> Thou also hast delivered מֵרִיבֵ֖י <WH7379> me from the strivings עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> of my people תִּשְׁמְרֵ֙נִי֙ <WH8104> thou hast kept לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> me [to be] head גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen עַ֥ם <WH5971> a people לֹא־ <WH3808> have not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> [which] I knew יַעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> not shall serve
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> afflicted נֵכָ֖ר <WH5236> alien יִתְכַּֽחֲשׁוּ־ <WH3584> shall submit לִ֑י לִשְׁמ֥וֹעַ <WH8085> they shall be obedient אֹ֖זֶן <WH241> they יִשָּׁ֥מְעוּ <WH8085> obey לִֽי׃
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> afflicted נֵכָ֖ר <WH5236> alien יִבֹּ֑לוּ <WH5034> shall fade away וְיַחְגְּר֖וּ <WH2296> and they shall be afraid מִמִּסְגְּרוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4526> out of their close places

חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD וּבָר֣וּךְ <WH1288> and blessed צוּרִ֑י <WH6697> [be] my rock וְיָרֻ֕ם <WH7311> and exalted אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> be the God צ֥וּר <WH6697> of the rock יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <WH3468> of my salvation
